title.rendered: Macallan 30 Year Old Sherry Oak 2020 Release

excerpt.rendered:
The Macallan Sherry Oak 30 Years Old Annual 2020 Release. A distinguished single malt matured exclusively in Oloroso sherry seasoned oak casks from Jerez, Spain for 30 years resulting in this luxurious, naturally dark single malt characterised by its rich flavours of dried fruits, orange and spice.

Bottle size : 700
Distillery : Macallan
Age : 30
Vintage : 
ABV : 43.00%
